fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Eviscerate (Day): Cause a target to begin bleeding, they will die in two nights unless healed. Cannot be protected against unless by a Day Town Protective. 2 uses.
Blood Check (Night): Check a player for umbral blood. You will be notified if they are a member of your team.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
No access to the factional chat.
No access to promotion until they are the last member, in which they will become the Umbra (Assault).
Does not know team members.
